sourcesContent: import Popup from 'reactjs-popup' import Cookies from 'js-cookie' import 'reactjs-popup/dist/index.css' import {FiLogOut} from 'react-icons/fi' import ModeContext from '../../context/ModeContext' import { PopupContainer, PopupCard, Buttons, CancelBtn, ConfirmBtn, Logout, LogoutBtn, Paragraph, } from './styledComponents' const LogoutPopup = props => { const {mode} = props return ( {value => { const {darkMode} = value return ( Logout } > {close => ( <> Are you sure you want to logout? close()} type="button"> Cancel Confirm )} ) }} ) } export default LogoutPopup
